entry.title: Christmas update for Super Time Bomb
entry.content:
Ho ho ho! Yes, December has just kicked in, so we’ve officially entered the Christmas period now. Everywhere you keep seeing reindeers, Christmas trees, people singing carols, mince pies (or perhaps turr√≥n and mantecados, depending where you live!)… and we though that you probably wouldn’t want to leave the Christmas spirit behind just to play Super Time Bomb, right?

So it’s your lucky day then, because we’ve included two lovely Christmas outfits for Lollipop today: a Santa’s hat, and a Rudolph costume.

Go to the Google Play Store to update now!

Lollipop and Coconauts wish you a very merry Christmas and a happy new year!
